title: 2014 - The Year In Christian Music (Bundle 22)
description:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
2014 - THE YEAR IN CHRISTIAN MUSIC
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

I just returned home from a wonderful road trip.  Met some great people.  Saw some beautiful things.  But that didn't stop me from occasionally finding internet connectivity to keep on top, and grab some of the latest releases for you all.

That being said, I am already planning my next trip.  And it may happen within a week or so if I can gather together enough essential supplies.  If it works out as I hope it will, this trip will be quite isolated.  No internet.  No gas station for miles and miles.  No people.  Nothing but God's glorious untouched creation.  The type of trip where if you're not packing some groceries and several cans of gas in a cargo holder, you're in trouble.  So I'm rather looking forward to it.  I may even do a little crossbow hunting while I'm gone.  Nothing like catching your own breakfast.

But getting back to today's torrent.  It's been a long time in coming.  I appreciate everyone's patience while I was away.  Hopefully one or two of these titles being shared today will be of interest to you.  I'm currently working on Bundle 23, but I'm not sure when I'll be able to tossed it up.  But I'll try my best.

ALTERNATIVE: Anberlin, Ember Days, Jars of Clay, Sleeping At Last.  CONTEMPORARY: Anthem Lights, Chris Tomlin, Fellowship Creative, Michael W Smith.  R&B: Anthony Skinner.  ROCK: The Beautiful Discord, Dilip, For King And Country, Michael Sweet, Seventh Day Slumber.  POP: Beckah Shae.  GOSPEL: Deitrick Haddon.  PRAISE & WORSHIP: Hillside Worship, iHOP, NewSpring Worship, Onething Live, Passion, Shane And Shane.  INSTRUMENTAL: Jim Brickman.  HIP-HOP/RAP: Joey Prophet, K-Drama, Social Club, Tedashii, Thi'sl.  HARDCORE/METAL: Wolves At The Gate.

Our year-to-date count is now up to 772 shares.

The 30 titles being offered today include...

 * Anberlin - 2014 - Dissenter - Single
 * Anberlin - 2014 - Stranger Ways - Single
 * Anthem Lights - 2014 - One Direction Mash-Up 2 - Single
 * Anthony Skinner - 2014 - Your Love Never Fails - With The Immersion Family Band
 * Beautiful Discord, The - 2014 - Refuge EP
 * Beckah Shae - 2014 - Champion
 * Chris Tomlin - 2014 - Waterfall - Single
 * Deitrick Haddon - 2014 - League Of Xtraordinary Worshippers
 * Dilip - 2014 - Take My Breath Away - Single
 * Ember Days - 2014 - Live
 * Fellowship Creative - 2014 - Running To Follow
 * For King And Country - 2014 - Fix My Eyes - Single
 * Hillside Worship - 2014 - God Above All
 * iHop - 2014 - Endless - Songs Of Eternity
 * Jars of Clay - 2014 - Reckless Forgiver - Remixes - Single
 * Jim Brickman - 2014 - Blessings
 * Joey Prophet - 2014 - Fight Klub
 * K-Drama - 2014 - Wish It Was Sooner
 * Michael Sweet - 2014 - I'm Not Your Suicide
 * Michael W Smith - 2014 - Sovereign
 * NewSpring Worship - 2014 - Salvation Rise
 * Onething Live - 2014 - Sing Your Praises
 * Passion - 2014 - Take It All - Deluxe Edition
 * Pillar - 2014 - Lion Leads The Way - Single
 * Seventh Day Slumber - 2014 - We Are The Broken

God Bless,
TorrentTracts, May 2014
